Package org.frc5010.common.config.json.devices

Class DeviceConfigReader

java.lang.Object
org.frc5010.common.config.json.devices.DeviceConfigReader
public class DeviceConfigReader extends Object
A class for reading device configurations from JSON files.

  • Method Details

    • getMotor

      public static GenericMotorController getMotor(String controller, String type, int id)
      Retrieves a motor controller based on the specified type and ID.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of motor, e.g., "neo" or "kraken".
      id - The unique identifier for the motor.
      Returns:
      A MotorController5010 instance for the specified type and ID, or null if the type is not recognized.

    • readDeviceConfig

      public static void readDeviceConfig(GenericSubsystem system, File deviceFile, String key) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Reads a device configuration from the given file and adds it to the system.
      Parameters:
      system - the system to add the device to
      deviceFile - the file containing the device configuration
      key - the key of the device to read (e.g., "gyro", "percent_motor", etc.)
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException - if the file cannot be read
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - if the file cannot be parsed
      IOException - if there is an error reading the file

    • getSmartMotor

      public static Optional<yams.motorcontrollers.SmartMotorController> getSmartMotor(String controller, String type, int id, yams.motorcontrollers.SmartMotorControllerConfig config, String canbus)
      Get a SmartMotorController wrapper from the provided motor controller object and simulate it with the provided motor simulator.
      Parameters:
      controller - Motor controller type. Supported types are "spark", "sparkmax", "talonfx", "talonfxs", "nova", "thrifty", "thrifty_nova", and "thriftynova".
      type - Motor type. Supported types are "neo", "neo550", "krakenx60", and "krakenx60foc".
      id - Motor ID.
      config - SmartMotorControllerConfig for the motor controller.
      Returns:
      SmartMotorController wrapper for the motor controller.

    • getSimulatedMotor

      public static edu.wpi.first.math.system.plant.DCMotor getSimulatedMotor(String type, int numberOfMotors)

    • getReflectedGenericMotor

      public static Object getReflectedGenericMotor(String controller, int id, String canbus)
      Get a motor controller based on the controller type and motor type.
      Parameters:
      controller - The type of motor controller, e.g. "spark", "talonfx", "nova", "thrifty", "thrifty_nova", or "thriftynova"
      id - The CAN ID of the motor controller
      canbus - The CAN bus of the motor controller
      Returns:
      The motor controller object

    • checkDirectory

      public static void checkDirectory(File directory)
      Method to check the existence of specific JSON configuration files in the provided directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory to check for JSON configuration files
